#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n,k;
        cin>>n>>k;

        long long int triangles = n*(n-1)*(n-2);
        triangles = triangles - k*(k-1)*(k-2);
        triangles = triangles/6;

        cout<<triangles<<endl;
    }
}
